title: What is the "trascendenza immanente" and the practice of repeating a divine name or formula in Taoist teachings?
first_phrase: In this text, the author challenges the idea that Tao is outside the theater, and the magician is only behind the scenes. The Tao is both inside and outside the theater, and this also applies to those who truly understand the Tao. The author emphasizes the importance of focusing on a simple practice rather than seeking various things and wasting energy. The text also discusses the use of a specific method, such as the repetition of a divine name, in Islamic traditions. The author concludes by cautioning readers about the dangers of false enlightenment and the importance of staying on the path of "dry practice." The upcoming monograph will address the role of a teacher and spiritual influence in the practice.
content: Quando di fronte a dati risultati sono possibili reazioni diverse, dalle quali dipende rà anzi l'andamento ulteriore del processo, non ci si può limitare al « Fa questo e basta »: è cosí che, per un fine pratico, l'insegnamento iniziatico dà una certa tal quale de scrittiva circa le stesse esperienze dell'oltretomba (cfr. il Libro tibetano del morto). — Quanto al metodo indicato, come uno dei molti, esso corrisponde alla ripetizione di un « nome divino » o di una certa formula (dhikr), in uso so prattutto nell'islam; su ciò è stato detto (vol. I, p. 95). last_phrase: In conclusion, when faced with data, different reactions are possible, and the direction of the process depends on them. Therefore, initiatory teaching provides some description of the experiences of the afterlife, and using a method such as repeating a divine name or a formula can be beneficial. It's important to be cautious about letting light sing as it may lead to inconclusive lyricism. Only in special circumstances can one revive the state of bringing light from a great living tradition to animate all forms of sensitivity and human activity. Finally, even with the best intentions, such writings on magic or initiation will never be accessible to everyone.
